name: 6639c335-b04c-4526-a11a-a259400cfcdb
displayName: Renaming the transaction number for an 835 import

text.text: Where do I navigate to rename the transaction number for an 835 import?

text: To rename the transaction number for an 835 import, you can click the transaction amount.

text.text: What steps should I follow to initiate the process of renaming the transaction number?

text: To rename the transaction number for an 835 import, you can click the transaction amount. Once you have clicked the transaction amount, a pop-up window will appear. In this pop-up window, you will be able to enter the new transaction number. Once you have entered the new transaction number, click the "Save" button.

text.text: What information do I need to provide when clicking "Import a transaction" on the Payments page?

text: When you click "Import a transaction" on the Payments page, you need to provide the following information: deposit date, transaction amount, payer name, transaction number, transaction date, claim number.

text.text: After uploading the 835 file, what action should I take to edit the transaction?

text: To edit a transaction, you can click the transaction amount. Once you have clicked the transaction amount, a pop-up window will appear. In this pop-up window, you will be able to enter the new transaction number. Once you have entered the new transaction number, click the "Save" button.

text.text: What options are available on the "Edit Transaction" window?

text: To view the transactions you just posted, or need to edit or reverse the transactions, then click Payments. Payments on this page are listed by date. You can delete an individual transaction, reverse the entire transaction, or edit the transaction.

text.text: Can I change the transaction number multiple times before posting the transaction?

text: Yes, you can change the transaction number multiple times before posting the transaction.

text.text: Is there a limit to the number of times I can alter the transaction number?

text: You can change the transaction number multiple times before posting the transaction.

text.text: What happens if I attempt to re-upload the file with the original transaction number?

text: If you attempt to re-upload the file with the original transaction number, the system will assign a regular period instead of an adjustment period.

text.text: How does the system respond when trying to re-upload a file with a modified transaction number?

text: If you attempt to re-upload the file with a modified transaction number, the system will assign a regular period instead of an adjustment period.

text.text: What does the error message display when re-uploading a file with the original transaction number?

text: If you attempt to re-upload the file with the original transaction number, the system will assign a regular period instead of an adjustment period.

text.text: Can I revert to the original transaction number after renaming it once?

text: If you accidentally re-posted the payment with a current date, the system will assign a regular period instead of an adjustment period, which will result in the credit looking like new money instead of re-posted money.

text.text: How can I access the transaction page associated with the most recent transaction number?

text: To access the transaction page associated with the most recent transaction number, you can click Payments in the navigation bar and then Create a transaction.

text.text: Are there any restrictions on changing the transaction number after posting the transaction?

text: You cannot change the transaction number after posting the transaction.

text.text: What precautions should I take before finalizing the transaction number change?

text: You cannot change the transaction number after posting the transaction.

text.text: What happens if I accidentally change the transaction number and need to revert it?

text: If you accidentally change the transaction number and need to revert it, you can reverse the transaction.

text.text: How does ZOLL Billing ensure the integrity and security of transaction number modifications?

text: If the accounting period in which the transaction was posted is still open, the transaction will reverse in that period. If not, the adjustment will happen in the next open period.

text.text: How to rename a transaction number after importing an 835 file?

text: You can rename a transaction number after importing an 835 file by clicking the transaction amount.
